Label:
Consumer
protection
tools
Description:
Voluntary tools offered by
gambling companies to help
their customers manage their
gambling

Label: Restrictions
Description:
Limits or restrictions on
how and what people
can gamble on (typically
mandated by government)

Label:
Product
design
Description:
Changes to the gambling
product or environment
that facilitate safer
gambling

Label:
Operator
comms
Description:
Communication by companies
to their customers about
safer gambling

Label:
Public
health
campaigns
Description:
Mass regional or national
campaigns designed to
discourage gambling or
promote responsible
gambling

Label:
Self-
assessments
Description:
Online assessments of problem
gambling/ gambling harms

Label:
Self-imposed
limits
Description:
Voluntary limits on expenditure
or play time selected by
consumers

Label:
Account
deactivation
Description:
Ability to voluntarily deactivate
one's account permanently
or temporarily

Label: Messaging
Description:
Prevention messages sent by
gambling companies to their
customers are typically called
"warning" or "responsible
gambling" messages (see
subtypes for more details)

Label:
Direct
contact
Description:
Direct consumer contact
via email/ phone/ in person
by the company to discuss
safer gambling

Label:
Product
labelling
Description:
Government mandated labelling
on gambling products (e.g.,
electronic gaming machines)
to provide consumers with
information (e.g., house-edge)
or warn them about gambling
harms

Label:
Banning types
of gambling
Description:
Prohibiting types of gambling/
gambling activities such as online
gambling or sports wagering

Label:
Banning ways
of gambling
Description:
Prohibiting means of gambling
such as the ability to place
in-game bets

Label:
Warning
messages
Description:
Messages that warn about
problem gambling or
gambling harms

Label:
Informative
messages
Description:
Messages that present
information about safer
gambling (e.g., house-edge
or misconceptions about
chances of success)

Label:
Self appraisal
messages
Description:
Messages that encourag
people to consider the extent
or impact of their gambling
